CustomField.description:
Define the relationship that should be used when the document is focused on a related entity.
For example if the template is associated with the Account object and the document content focus on a specific Contact that is associated with the Account the field should be set to 'Contacts'. This will result in the user being presented with an option to select the Contact when generating the document from the template.
Examples on the Account object: - Contacts - Contacts.Owner
Examples on the Loan object: - LLC_BI__Legal_Entities__r.LLC_BI__Account__r
CustomField.label: Relationship
